body.name: AGGICE Side Table, 3 Tier 2 Shelf Small Bookshelf Bookcase for Small Spaces, Bedside End Table Nightstand, Kids Book Storage Shelves for Bedroom Living Room Office, White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 9 hrs
features: This side table is upgraded design one. It is made of thicker PVC board and with side protect. The size of the beside table is 15.6 x 9.5 x 23.5 inches. This is a small bookshelf for small spaces for you if you do not have much space.

It is a bedside table too. You can put your lamp and mobile phone on the top tier. You put the books and other stuffs in the 2 shelf bookcase is a nice choice. And because it is not solid wood material, it is lighter. So, you can move it easily by yourself.

It is a nice small bookshelf. Because of the small size design of this bookcase, it is very nice for the small spaces. And it is very sturdy after your installation. The material is PVC. The advantages are waterproof and Eco-friendly. It is nice for home and office use. Because the material is harmless to the human body.

Work as a kids bookshelf is also a good choice too. Because of its light weight, it will not hurt your kids. It is white color, it matches almost all the furniture. And this bookcase is really easy to put together. You can put it together in 10 minutes. And you will find this small bookshelf is really sturdy and it can hold a lot of books.

May be you want to use it as a end table. You can put it beside your sofa and put your coffee on top and books into the 2 shelf bookcase too. You can enjoy your time by reading a book and enjoy your coffee. It is a multipurpose bookcase. It is not only a bookshelf but also a bathroom table, nightstand, side table and more. If up to what you want it to be and where you place it.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: End Table Material Made of PVC material, to ensure the stability and durability of the product, waterproof, simple and easy to clean. Neat and Simple Can be used to organize books, newspapers, magazines, can also be placed flower pot, random clothes, clean and neat. Because its waterproof effect is good, still can place bathroom articles for use. Creative shelving The bookshelf material uses is environmental protection qualitative zero formaldehyde, do not become moldy, use hollow out carve a flower, no matter be used to place any artcle so natural and comfortable.

Dining table 3 layers of storage can be a good place to pick up items, paper towels, cutlery, condiments, etc. Nightstand Because simple and generous can also be used as a side cabinet or bedside table, convenient for you to take cosmetics, bedtime reading and other books. Multifunctional shelving Suitable for a variety of scenarios, can be used side table, coffee table, small dining table, end table, sofa cabinet, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute, lightweight
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I really like how easy this was to put together. It came with gloves to help put the pieces together without scratching or cutting my hands. Some of the inserted pieces did crack a little, but had I been more careful I don't know that it would have happened. Super easy to clean and very lightweight. So easy to move around with room rearranging. I would definitely buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for light weight items
reviews.reviewText: This is perfect for the bathroom as it is not wood and will not be affected by the humidity. Putting it together is easier with two people but can be done solo. I use it for light weight items and I’m very happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and perfect for kids room
reviews.reviewText: I bought 2 of these. My first one was easy to put together and study. It seemed well made and worth the price. The next one I purchased was extremely hard to put together. I had to use a hammer since the holes didn’t align properly together which cause wood to splinter. It’s still very cute in my kids room and fits quite a bit of books on it as well as other things like their lamps and Alexa’s.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I wanted
reviews.reviewText: My daughters have a bunkbed with a slide. The lower bunk sits on the floor and the upper bunk is a mid-size height that a slide comes off of. My daughter who sleeps on the lower bunk wanted something for storage beside her bed for Pokémon Cards and her books as well as for other things that seven-year-old girls collect. This so far has been perfect except for the fact that it tips over rather easily. But that is not a huge problem because it is not very big, and I don't expect that it is something that would injure her if it fell on her because it really is not that heavy. If it were against the wall, it would probably be less likely to tip over, but this sits underneath the slide right next to the lower bunk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not wood, pressed foam core with plastic exterior
reviews.reviewText: Ordered two of these. First one was missing screws. They are not wood. Made out of pressed foam with plastic exterior. Pieces did not align and broke easily when trying to assemble. Not worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quick and Stylish end table.
reviews.reviewText: I mounted this lovely bookshelf on the inside of an office closet door. It holds training manuals and since it is attached to the door when you close it, I don't have to bump into those manuals any longer. Excellent product, super easy to put together (I hate those long IKEA-estimated-1-hour-done-in-5-hours instructions). I put it together in less than 15 minutes and had it hanging on the inside closet door in 30 minutes. No more clutter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not bad for the price
reviews.reviewText: It does look good, but it is not very sturdy. It was easy to put together but the slots to put the tabs in were not lined up well. It did come with a pair of gloves to help. I had to use a hammer which I padded with the gloves. It split in a couple of places but not so bad that it is noticeable from the front. I like the way it looks and was just right for the space I had in the bathroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute little snap-together book case
reviews.reviewText: This was very easy to install - it came with gloves to wear when putting it together, because the pieces are snapped together by pushing or hitting with your hands. Very easily assembled. It's small and lightweight - perfect for what we wanted (two shelves to hold stuffed animals and have a shelf on top for other things). Also, a great height for a night table next to my son's bed.

Since maybe the pictures don't show it as much, the assembled product will have so many visible screws on the side and it's kinda disappointing because the sides are cute. I guess I could diy and get something to hide them, but I didn't want to spend more.If you put it together on your floor, on a carpet, it'll make you feel self-conscious that it was not as clean as you thought because everything stuck to it with static. It is literally putting together puzzle pieces and alone, you might curse a little.I didn't want to pay too much for a side table and it does the job. That's what I needed.

The shelf is made to be assembled like a puzzle, with pieces having to be inserted into one another. It was however impossible, the pieces that need to be inserted are much too big to fit into the holes. We returned the item.
Poor quality materials. Item broke upon assembly.
Beautiful timers, but they do not work.

reviews.reviewTitle: Puzzle like joints that don’t fit - wood splits
reviews.reviewText: Puzzle like joints that don’t fit - wood splits
